actions.message:
***HELP***

**COMMANDS**
!kick                 (Admin Only)
!ban                  (Admin Only)
!purge [Number]       (Admin Only)
!flrp                -gives you the FL RP MEMBER role
!ems                 -gives you the EMS role
!fire                -gives you the fire role
!help                -brings up the help message
!police              -gives you the police role
!policeunit [Number] -gives you a police unit number
!emsunit [Number]    -gives you a EMS unit number
!fireunit [Number]   -gives you a fire unit number
!warn                -Warns the tagged member! (Admin Only)
